text: Dingolfing-Landau (German: Landkreis Dingolfing-Landau, Bavarian: Landkroas Dinglfing-Landau) is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. The most important rivers of the district are the Isar and the Vils. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Dingolfing #Landau an der Isar #Eichendorf #Frontenhausen #Gottfrieding #Loiching #Mamming #Marklkofen 7. Mengkofen 8. Moosthenning 9. Niederviehbach 10. Pilsting 11. Reisbach 12. Simbach 13. Wallersdorf ==References==
title: Dingolfing-Landau
